summary:
Unlock greater capital control. Achieve higher capital efficiency. - When prices are going up, you can use Mode Right to have your liquidity position follow the price of an asset up as it increases. Your liquidity will not move if the price decreases.

 The AMM for all Market Conditions. - When prices are going down, you can use Mode Left to have your liquidity position follow the price of an asset down as it decreases. Your liquidity will not move if the price increases.

 Increase Efficiency with Maverick - Maverick AMM introduces the novel AMM concept of Directional LPing, which facilitates better capital control for liquidity providers and offers massive improvements in capital efficiency.
